org.jboss.jms.util
Class MessageQueueNameHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.jboss.jms.util.MessageQueueNameHelper
public class MessageQueueNameHelper
extends java.lang.Object

A MessageQueueNameHelper By convention, we name durable topic message queue names in the following way: . This is a helper class to aid in converting between the string form and the client id and subscription name and vice versa
